-- retrieveMchnApprSearchList 분석기기 > open기기 > 기기예약관리 목록조회 SELECT MPM.MCHN_PRCT_ID as "mchnPrctId" ,MPM.PRCT_TITL as "prctTitl" ,CONCAT(MIM.MCHN_HAN_NM ,'(', MIM.MCHN_EN_NM , ')') AS "mchnNm" ,MPM.PRCT_DT AS "prctDt" ,MPM.PRCT_FROM_TIM+'~'+MPM.PRCT_TO_TIM as "prctTim" ,SU.SA_NAME as "rgstNm" ,SU.SA_DEPT_NAME as "teamNm" ,MPM.PRCT_SCN_CD as "prctScnCd" ,ACC.COM_DTL_NM AS "prctScnNm" ,MPM.PRCT_FROM_TIM as "prctFromTim" ,MPM.PRCT_TO_TIM as "prctToTim" ,dbo.fn_getSabunName(MIM.MCHN_CRGR_ID) AS "mchnCrgrNm" ,MIM.MCHN_CRGR_ID as "mchnCrgrId" FROM IRIS_MCHN_INFO_MST MIM ,IRIS_MCHN_PRCT_MST MPM LEFT OUTER JOIN IRIS_SSO_USER SU ON MPM.RGST_ID = SU.SA_SABUN_NEW ,IRIS_ADM_COM_CD ACC WHERE MIM.DEL_YN = 'N' AND MPM.DEL_YN ='N' AND MIM.MCHN_INFO_ID = MPM.MCHN_INFO_ID AND ACC.COM_CD_CD = 'MCHN_APPR_RQ_ST' AND MPM.PRCT_SCN_CD = ACC.COM_DTL_CD
AND MPM.PRCT_TITL LIKE '%'+#{prctTitl}+'%'
AND ( MIM.MCHN_HAN_NM LIKE '%'+#{mchnNm}+'%' OR MIM.MCHN_EN_NM LIKE '%'+#{mchnNm}+'%' )
AND SU.SA_NAME LIKE '%'+#{rgstNm}+'%'
AND MPM.PRCT_SCN_CD = #{prctScnCd}
ORDER BY MPM.MCHN_PRCT_ID DESC

-- retrieveMchnApprInfo 기기관리 상세 조회 SELECT MPM.MCHN_PRCT_ID as "mchnPrctId" ,MPM.PRCT_TITL as "prctTitl" ,MIM.MCHN_HAN_NM as "mchnHanNm" ,MIM.MCHN_EN_NM as "mchnEnNm" ,CONCAT(MIM.MCHN_HAN_NM ,'(', MIM.MCHN_EN_NM , ')') AS "mchnNm" ,MPM.SMPO_NM as "smpoNm" ,MPM.SMPO_QTY as "smpoQty" ,MPM.PRCT_DT as "prctDt" ,MPM.PRCT_FROM_TIM as "prctFromTim" ,MPM.PRCT_TO_TIM as "prctToTim" ,SU.sa_name as "rgstNm" ,SU.sa_dept_name as "teamNm" ,SU.SA_MAIL as "rgstMail" ,MPM.PRCT_SCN_CD as "prctScnCd" ,ACC.COM_DTL_NM as "prctScnNm" ,MPM.DTL_SBC as "dtlSbc" ,(SELECT CONCAT('수료( 수료일 : ', MAX(MED.CCS_DT) ,')') FROM IRIS_MCHN_EDU_MST MEM ,IRIS_MCHN_EDU_DTL MED WHERE MEM.MCHN_INFO_ID = MPM.MCHN_INFO_ID AND MEM.MCHN_EDU_ID = MED.MCHN_EDU_ID AND MED.RGST_ID = MPM.RGST_ID AND MED.EDU_ST_CD = 'CCS' ) as "ccsNm" FROM IRIS_MCHN_INFO_MST MIM ,IRIS_MCHN_PRCT_MST MPM LEFT OUTER JOIN IRIS_SSO_USER SU ON MPM.RGST_ID = SU.SA_SABUN_NEW ,IRIS_ADM_COM_CD ACC WHERE MIM.DEL_YN = 'N' AND MIM.MCHN_INFO_ID = MPM.MCHN_INFO_ID AND ACC.COM_CD_CD = 'MCHN_APPR_RQ_ST' AND MPM.PRCT_SCN_CD = ACC.COM_DTL_CD AND MPM.MCHN_PRCT_ID = #{mchnPrctId}
